definition: as one wants/according to one's wishes/ruyi scepter, a symbol of power and good fortune
Italy/Italian/abbr. for 意大利[Yi4 da4 li4]
counting one's chickens before they are hatched
after one's heart (idiom); gratifying and satisfactory/everything one could wish
to have all one's wishes (idiom)/best wishes/all the best/may all your hopes be fulfilled
see 稱心如意|称心如意[chen4 xin1 ru2 yi4]

sentences.english: I wish you all the very best for the new year ahead.
sentences.chinese: 我祝你們在新的一年萬事如意。

sentences.english: The disappointments of life can knock us down.
sentences.chinese: 生活中種種不如意真的可以打倒我們。

sentences.english: Sunday well-spent brings a week of content.
sentences.chinese: 充實度過的星期天帶來稱心如意的一週。

sentences.english: Buddha illuminates, safe and happy. Paradise on death.
sentences.chinese: 佛光普照，事事順利，吉祥如意，幸福平安。

sentences.english: To conclude, I wish you every success in your work, happiness for you and your families, and good luck in everything.
sentences.chinese: 最後，祝大家工作順利，闔家幸福，萬事如意。

sentences.english: At this time of my parting, wish me good luck, my friends!
sentences.chinese: 在我動身的時候，祝我吉祥如意吧，我的朋友們。

sentences.english: Try to smile at the absurdities of life.
sentences.chinese: 試着笑對生活的不如意。

sentences.english: I hope everything is going well and you are enjoying your life there in Australia.
sentences.chinese: 我希望你一切安好，在澳大利亞的生活也都順心如意。

sentences.english: We all hope that this year can wealth.
sentences.chinese: 大家都希望今年能夠吉祥如意，招財進寶。

sentences.english: Chengdu hundred companies under the letter of the Electrical and Mechanical Company, Xichang wishful Trading Company.
sentences.chinese: 公司下設成都百信機電公司，西昌如意商貿有限公司。

sentences.english: One kiss at the right time, and she knew she had found Mr. Right.
sentences.chinese: 在正確的時間獻上一吻，她就知道她找到如意郎君了。

sentences.english: Test not equal to idea, coffee and often act as my outlet wine.
sentences.chinese: 考試不如意時，咖啡便常常充當我的解愁酒。

sentences.english: May the New Year bring you health, happiness and all other good things.
sentences.chinese: 祝您新春快樂，身體健康，萬事如意。

sentences.english: Tashi delek is the Tibet an greeting . It means "good luck".
sentences.chinese: 扎西德勒是藏族的問候語，它的意思是“吉祥如意”。

sentences.english: I bless her everythings all fine!
Tess felt light-hearted because everything in her life was going well.
sentences.chinese: 泰絲的生活事事如意，因此她感到相當自在。

definition: everything is going smoothly/just as one wishes
propitious wind throughout the journey (idiom)/plain sailing/to go smoothly/have a nice trip!
to have one's wishes come true/wish you the best!
after one's heart (idiom); gratifying and satisfactory/everything one could wish
to climb step by step/to rise steadily/on the up and up
